"Merry Christmas on Ice 2":
"Hello~! It's Shea here and I'm here to inform
this request on behalf on ARKS to you! For a
limited time this year, Naura's Confectionery
is opened at White Summit. I wonder if
anyone will buy us a cake for the annual
Christmas Party? We strongly recommend
you to come over to see the beautiful
scenery of glistening snowflakes right now!

Fail Condition:Defense Failure, Time runs out"
